title: 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, Pool, Hardwood Style Flooring
posting_body: Want more info on this unit?
This is a 2 Bedroom, 1.5 Bath, approximately 946 Sq.
Welcome to Sunset Peak Apartments, where we offer one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments in Thornton, Colorado.
Our townhome style community offers a uniquely charming neighborhood vibe with the modern touches you need and deserve.
At Sunset Peak, maintaining a strong sense of community is important to us.
Our Thornton, CO apartments come with access to some of the best in community amenities, and modern interior finishes that will make you proud to call our community home.
On our grounds you will find open, lush, green spaces that are great for afternoon picnics, a resort-style pool with an adjacent sundeck, and a playground.
Even your pets will love Sunset Peak, with access to their very own on-site dog park!
- Online Rent Payment and Maintenance Requests via Resident App
We are a pet friendly community.

Cats and dogs are welcome up to a limit of 2 per apartment home, however the following breeds are restricted: American Staffordshire Terriers, Staffordshire Bull Terriers, Rottweilers, Cane Corso, Presa Canarios, Bull Mastiffs, Wolf Hybrids.
Proof of spay or neuter and up to date vaccines are required for pet approval.
